addons.name: Action Duration Reminder
addons.description: Displays skill related reminders including buff/debuff duration tracking, cooldown timers, and proc alerts for Elder Scrolls Online.

addons.name: Advanced UI
addons.description: Advanced user interface for the Elder Scrolls Online

addons.name: Bandits User Interface
addons.description: User Interface add-on from Bandits guild. Contains: different UI styles, minimap, buff tracker, combat notifications and combat statistics.

addons.name: BeamMeUp
addons.description: Free fast travel to available players from your friend list, guilds and group. Teleporter utility addon.

addons.name: Breadcrumbs
addons.description: Draw lines on the map with /breadcrumbs command

addons.name: Buff The Group
addons.description: Monitor a single buff status across all group members

addons.name: BugCatcher
addons.description: A patched version of Werewolf Finds Dragon's BugCatcher addon for ESO. Catches and displays Lua errors.

addons.name: CombatMetrics
addons.description: A tool to analyse your performance in fights with detailed combat logging and statistics

addons.name: CombatMetronome
addons.description: An all-in-one cast bar for ESO with integrated sound cues and additional combat related info. Consolidates heavy swings, ability cooldowns, and cast/channel tracking.

addons.name: CrutchAlerts
addons.description: Combat alerts, boss health bars with mechanic thresholds, time until boss spawn, and more!

addons.name: ElmsMarkers
addons.description: Create, manage, and share markers on your 3D world map

addons.name: ExoYs Crux Tracker
addons.description: Tracks Crux stacks for the Arcanist class in Elder Scrolls Online.

addons.name: ExoYs Proc Set Timer
addons.description: Tracks proc set cooldowns and timers in Elder Scrolls Online.

addons.name: HodorReflexes
addons.description: View shared DPS and Ultimate data from group members in real-time.

addons.name: Huntsman Warmask Reminder
addons.description: Alerts you when wearing the Huntsman's Warmask mythic in combat but missing the bonus buff.

addons.name: HyperTools
addons.description: A framework for ESO that allows you to create and display graphics to track buffs, debuffs and other important information. Inspired by WoW's WeakAuras2.

addons.name: ImprovedDeathRecap
addons.description: An addon that gives you insight into why you died

addons.name: JoGroup
addons.description: JoGroup with UI hiding keybind. Enhanced group frames addon for ESO.

addons.name: LibAddonMenu-2.0
addons.description: A library that provides a comprehensive settings/options menu for ESO addons. Used by many popular addons.

addons.name: LibAsync
addons.description: A shared scheduler for deferred actions. Enables addons to schedule work across frames to prevent UI lag.

addons.name: LibChatMessage
addons.description: Library for handling chat messages with customizable formatters and generators.

addons.name: LibCombat
addons.description: Library that handles the data collection of combat events for addons like CombatMetrics

addons.name: LibCustomIcons
addons.description: A lightweight library for The Elder Scrolls Online that allows custom icons for players.

addons.name: LibCustomMenu
addons.description: Library that resolves an in-game bug triggering 'Access a private function from insecure code' errors with custom context-menu items. Provides enhanced submenu and divider support.

addons.name: LibCustomNames
addons.description: A lightweight library for The Elder Scrolls Online that allows custom names for players.

addons.name: LibDebugLogger
addons.description: A library that provides debug logging functionality for ESO addon developers. Enables structured logging with categories and severity levels.

addons.name: LibFloatingIcons
addons.description: Library for creating and managing floating icons and UI elements in Elder Scrolls Online.

addons.name: LibGroupBroadcast
addons.description: A library for broadcasting data between group members. Enables addons to share information across the group.

addons.name: LibGroupCombatStats
addons.description: A library for ESO addons to provide group combat statistics such as DPS, HPS, and ultimate status updates.

addons.name: LibHyper
addons.description: Various functions, textures and fonts used in Hyperioxes' addons.

addons.name: LibMediaProvider
addons.description: Facilitates the sharing of media (fonts, textures, etc) between addons

addons.name: LibSetDetection
addons.description: Library for detecting equipped gear sets in Elder Scrolls Online. Provides set detection functionality for other addons.

addons.name: LibSets
addons.description: Library providing data about all ingame item sets including set names, types, itemIds, drop locations, and API functions.

addons.name: LibSFUtils
addons.description: Library containing a variety of utilities used in Shadowfen's addons.

addons.name: LuiExtended
addons.description: Provides UnitFrames, InfoPanel, Combat Text & Info, Buff & Debuff Tracking, Chat Announcements and Slash Commands

addons.name: M0RMarkers
addons.description: A tool for placing 3D markers on the ground. Useful for raid callouts and positioning.

addons.name: OdySupportIcons
addons.description: Display support icons for raid and dungeon mechanics.

addons.name: pChat
addons.description: pChat overhauls the way text is displayed in the chatbox. Extensive chat customization and enhancement.

addons.name: SynergyPriority
addons.description: Customise synergy priorities to your liking. Control which synergies take precedence when multiple are available.

addons.name: Untaunted
addons.description: Helper for Tanks and Healers that tracks Taunt and other Debuffs

addons.name: WarMask
addons.description: Tracks Mark of Hircine and bashed target for Huntsman's Warmask. Shows icon when buff is active, countdown when bash is applied to target, and a line to the current target when it is under the reticle.

addons.name: Wizard's Wardrobe
addons.description: Throw all your setups into the wardrobe and let the wizard equip them exactly when you need it.
